blockers_ranked.issue: Non-goals section lacks specific version boundaries and scope exclusions
blockers_ranked.why: Ambiguous boundaries make it unclear what MVP-0 must NOT include, risking scope creep during implementation
blockers_ranked.exact_fix: Add explicit scope boundaries: 'No SAM2 integration', 'No cross-match re-ID', 'No possession analysis', 'No ball detection integration'
blockers_ranked.override_option: Accept that some boundary testing may be needed during implementation to clarify scope

blockers_ranked.issue: Success criteria use vague terms 'contract-valid', 'explicit break semantics', 'prevented by design'
blockers_ranked.why: Implementation team cannot objectively verify success without measurable criteria
blockers_ranked.exact_fix: Define: 'contract-valid' = passes schema validation + test fixtures, 'explicit break semantics' = break_reason field populated, 'prevented by design' = gating thresholds specified
blockers_ranked.override_option: Rely on existing contract validation tests to define 'contract-valid' without additional specification

blockers_ranked.issue: Team assignment 'confidence-first outputs' and 'low-confidence handling' undefined
blockers_ranked.why: No threshold specified for what constitutes 'low confidence' or how it should be handled
blockers_ranked.exact_fix: Specify confidence threshold (e.g., <0.7) and handling behavior (emit 'Unknown' team or explicit diagnostics)
blockers_ranked.override_option: Let implementation choose reasonable defaults with diagnostic logging

ambiguities.risk: Implementation team interprets differently, leading to inconsistent behavior
ambiguities.proposed_rewrite: prefer breaks over swaps when track association confidence < 0.8; prefer Unknown over guessed values

ambiguities.risk: Unclear distinction from test fixtures or what constitutes 'real'

ambiguities.proposed_rewrite: emit confidence scores; when confidence < threshold, use Unknown state with diagnostic reason

recommended_edits: Add models/ to paths_excluded to prevent model checkpoint commits

tasks.notes: All 5 planned tasks exist and are correctly spelled

work_packages.notes: All tasks assigned to work packages with clear titles

close_gates.notes: Standard close gates defined: generate, guardrails, audit:intent

guardrail_plan.notes: Requirements have defined guardrails; implementation tracking will be validated

minimum_next_steps: Specify confidence thresholds for team assignment and MOT
Add explicit scope boundaries to non_goals
